# Adjust Origins

## Description
Adjust all Surface Group origins for better rendering in preview mode

## Modeler Description
Adjust all Surface Group origins for better rendering in preview mode

## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### Move Z Origins
Move the building to set minimum z value as 0
**Name:** move_z,
**Type:** Boolean,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false
